Feature Notes:

Fighting Style: 1 selection
Martial Archetype: 1 selection
Linguist: Can create ciphers (DC 25 Intelligence to decode)
Lucky: Can gain advantage on an attack, ability, or saving throw or inflict foe disadvantage an attack on self 3 times per long rest
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of FR-Deneir and fellow believers

Bonus Proficiency (Cavalier): Skill Proficiency (Choose 1 from Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, Persuasion)

Elegant Courtier: +1 Persuasion
Linguist: Language (Choose 3 from any)
Actor: Has advantage on Deception and Performance to impersonate another person and can mimic others' speech or sounds
Born To The Saddle: Has advantage on saves vs. falling off mount, lands on feet after a 10' fall from mount, and dismount and mount each cost only 5' movement
Bulky Armor: Has disadvantage on Stealth
Combat
Hit Points: 91 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 16 Attacks Per Round: 4
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Half Plate Shield: None Weapons: Greataxe (+8 1d12+2); Light Hammer (+8 1d4+2 R20/60); Rapier (+8 1d8+2); Shortbow (+9 1d6+1 R80/320); Unarmed (+8 1+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Extra Attack: +3 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Archery): +2 ranged attacks
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Action Surge: Can take an extra action twice per short rest
Arcane Shot: Can use an Arcane Shot effect once per rd 2 times per short rest
Banishing Arrow: Arrow inflicts banishment to Feywild (save DC 18 Charisma negates) for 1 rd and +2d6 HP force
Beguiling Arrow: Arrow inflicts +4d6 HP psychic, and the target becomes charmed by a chosen ally within 30' for 1 rd (save DC 18 Wisdom HP only; ally attacking the target ends)
Bursting Arrow: Successful arrow attack inflicts +4d6 HP force damage in a 10' radius
Curving Shot: Can use a bonus action to redirect a magic arrow miss to another target within 60'
Enfeebling Arrow: Arrow inflicts +4d6 HP necrotic damage and reduces the damage inflicted by target attacks by half for 1 rd (save DC 18 Constitution HP only)
Ever-Ready Shot: Has a minimum of 1 Arcane Shot use available after initiative
Ferocious Charger: Can knock prone with a hit after a 10' move (save DC 16 Strength negates) once per rd
Fighting Spirit: Can use a bonus action to gain advantage on attacks for 1 rd and 15 temporary hit points 3 times per long rest
Grasping Arrow: Arrow inflicts +4d6 HP poison damage, -10' Speed, and 4d6 HP slashing per rd upon target move for 1 min (save DC 18 Athletics ends)
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
Hold The Line: Foe move within reach provokes an opportunity attack; a hit halts the move
Magic Arrow: Arrows count as magic weapons
Piercing Arrow: Arrow passes harmlessly through objects and inflicts +2d6 HP piercing damage (save DC 18 Dexterity half) to creatures in a 30'x1' line
Polearm Master: Can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of a polearm, inflicting 1d4 HP bludgeoning, and a foe entering polearm reach provokes an opportunity attack
Rapid Strike: Can forego advantage on an attack to gain an extra attack once per rd
Savage Attacker: Can take the best of two melee damage rolls once per rd
Second Wind: Can use a bonus action to regain 1d10+20 hit points once per short rest
Seeking Arrow: Arrow ignores 3/4 cover, inflicting +2d6 HP force and revealing the target (save DC 18 Dexterity half HP only)
Shadow Arrow: Arrow inflicts +4d6 HP psychic damage and 5' vision (save DC 18 Wisdom HP only) for 1 rd
Strength Before Death: Can take an extra turn when brought to 0 HP once per long rest
Tireless Spirit: Has a minimum 1 Fighting Spirit use available after initiative
Unwavering Mark: Can mark a foe for 1 rd with a successful attack 2 times per long rest; its attacks on others when adjacent to self suffer disadvantage and allow self to use a bonus action to attack with advantage, inflicting +10 HP weapon damage
Vigilant Defender: Can use a reaction to make an opportunity attack on every other creature's turn
Warding Maneuver: When using a melee weapon or shield, can give self or an adjacent ally +1d8 Armor Class and damage resistance when struck once per long rest
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 7; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 4; Strength: 8; Wisdom: 7
Save Notes:
Elegant Courtier: Save Proficiency (Wisdom)
Indomitable: Can reroll a failed save 3 times per long rest
Magic
Spells:
Druidcraft (Fighter0 [Arcane Archer Lore] Tran): R30' Predicts 24 hr weather, causes a plant to bloom, creates a minor sensory effect, or lights or snuffs a small fire
Prestidigitation (Fighter0 [Arcane Archer Lore] Tran): R10' Creates minor magic effects for 1 hr
Magic Notes: Arcane Archer Lore: Knows either the Druidcraft or Prestidigitation cantrip
